DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether re-feeding gastric residual reduces time need establish full enteral feeding premature infant . Infants gestational age 23-28 week birth randomize within one week receive either gastric residual fresh formula breastmilk whenever significant residual feed advancement require clinical assessment continue feeding . Primary outcome measure time establish full enteral feeding ( 120cc/kg/day ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Infants gestational age 23-28 week birth randomize within one week receive either gastric residual fresh formula breastmilk whenever significant residual feed advancement require clinical assessment continue feeding . Feeding advancement determine clinical physician .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Gestational age 23.0 28.6 week ; 2 . Receiving intravenous fluid enteral nutrition trophic feed ; 3 . Written inform consent parent 1 . Major congenital/chromosomal anomaly ; 2 . Moribund infant low likelihood survival , opinion clinical team
